## üöÄ Create your first Dot

::card-group{:cols="2"}

  ::card
  --- 
  title: "Ways to Start a Dot" 
  icon: "1Ô∏è‚É£üì∏"
  to: "/getting-started/user-guide/create-dot/create-dot"

  ---
  Open the quick capture bar. Select the option of capture. Your Dot is created automatically and ready for collaboration.
  > üí° Tip: Choose the capture mode that best fits your screen or area.
  ::

  ::card
  ---
  title: "Let's create RUMA Dots"
  icon: "2Ô∏è‚É£üñäÔ∏è"
  to: "/getting-started/user-guide/annotations/shapes-annotation"
  ---
  Markup or annotate or even add stickers to highlight collaboration points
  > üí° Tip: Use the Highlighter for emphasis, the Pen for shapes, and the Pencil to freely draw.
  ::

  ::card
  ---
  title: "Add a Comment"
  icon: "3Ô∏è‚É£üóíÔ∏è"
  to: "/getting-started/user-guide/dot-kit/text-box"

  ---
  Start collaboration, ask a question, suggest an idea and mention people you want those from.
  > üí° Tip: Keep notes short and combine them with annotations for better clarity.
  ::

  ::card
  ---
  title: "Say more with magic marker "
  icon: "4Ô∏è‚É£‚ú®"
  to: "/getting-started/user-guide/annotations/short-magic-marker"
  ---
  Double-click anywhere to open the Magic Marker and quickly write down your thoughts.
  > üí° Tip: Perfect for quick ideas, reminders, or spontaneous feedback.
  ::

  ::card
  ---
  title: "Dynamic Collaboration"
  icon: "5Ô∏è‚É£üòÑüè∑Ô∏è"
  to: "/getting-started/user-guide/dot-kit/emojis"
  ---
 Mention people on the go as the conversation grows.
  > üí° Tip: Stickers are great for quick signals like approval, attention, or feedback status.
  ::

  ::card
  ---
  title: "About DOT wall"
  icon: "6Ô∏è‚É£üß±"
  to: "/getting-started/user-guide/dot-wall-notifications/dot-wall-search"
  ---
 Discover the DOT Wall ‚Äî your central space where all your dots come together for easy viewing, feedback, and collaboration.
  > üí° Tip: Add a short message so collaborators understand the context right away.
  ::

::
